trans-unit.source: Animates from the <see cref="T:System.Char" /> value of the previous key frame to its own <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.CharKeyFrame.Value" /> using discrete interpolation.
trans-unit.target: 使用离散内插，从上一个关键帧的 <see cref="T:System.Char" /> 值动画处理到其自身的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.CharKeyFrame.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: This class is used as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.CharKeyFrameCollection> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.CharAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to animate a <xref:System.Char> property value along a set of key frames.
trans-unit.target: 此类用作的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.CharKeyFrameCollection>结合<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.CharAnimationUsingKeyFrames>要进行动画处理<xref:System.Char>根据一组关键帧的属性值。

trans-unit.source: A key frame defines a segment of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.CharAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to which it belongs.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧定义的一个段<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.CharAnimationUsingKeyFrames>它所属。

trans-unit.source: Each key frame has a target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.CharKeyFrame.Value%2A> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.CharKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 每个关键帧都有一个目标<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.CharKeyFrame.Value%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.CharKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.CharKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A> specifies the time at which the key frame's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.CharKeyFrame.Value%2A> should be reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.CharKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>指定的时间关键帧的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.CharKeyFrame.Value%2A>应到达。

trans-unit.source: A key frame animates from the target value of the previous key frame to its own target value.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧动画应用到其自己的目标值的上一个关键帧的目标值。

trans-unit.source: It starts when the previous key frame ends and ends when its own key time is reached.
trans-unit.target: 它将启动时上一个关键帧结束，并在达到其自己的关键时间时结束。

trans-unit.source: Discrete key frames like <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteCharKeyFrame> create sudden "jumps" between values (no Interpolation).
trans-unit.target: 之类的离散的关键帧<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteCharKeyFrame>突变""值 （无内插）。

trans-unit.source: In other words, the animated property does not change until the key frame's key time is reached at which point the animated property goes suddenly to the target value.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，才在哪个点的属性的基值突然达到目标值到达关键帧的关键时间，也会发生变化的属性的基值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteCharKeyFrame" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteCharKeyFrame" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteCharKeyFrame" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteCharKeyFrame" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧的结束值（也称为“目标值”）。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteCharKeyFrame" /> class with the specified ending value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的结束值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteCharKeyFrame" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧的结束值（也称为“目标值”）。

trans-unit.source: Key time for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧的关键时间。

trans-unit.source: The key time determines when the target value is reached which is also when the key frame ends.
trans-unit.target: 关键时间确定达到目标值的时间，同时也是关键帧结束的时间。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteCharKeyFrame" /> class with the specified ending value and key time.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的结束值和关键时间初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteCharKeyFrame" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteCharKeyFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteCharKeyFrame" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteCharKeyFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteCharKeyFrame" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The value to animate from.
trans-unit.target: 动画起始值。

trans-unit.source: A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
trans-unit.target: 一个介于 0.0 和 1.0 之间的值（包含 0.0 和 1.0），该值指定此关键帧已经过去的时间的百分比。

trans-unit.source: Interpolates between the previous key frame value and the value of the current key frame using discrete interpolation.
trans-unit.target: 使用离散内插在上一个关键帧值和当前的关键帧值之间进行内插。

trans-unit.source: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
trans-unit.target: 给定了指定基值和进度时此关键帧的输出值。
